title: Part A
stimulusHtml: Select a point value to view scoring criteria, solutions, and/or examples and to score the response.
descriptions: The response does not show that the two rightmost peaks are circled.
The response shows that the two rightmost peaks are circled, as shown below.

title: Part B

title: Part C
stimulusHtml: Select a point value to view scoring criteria, solutions, and/or examples and to score the response. The student can earn one point if an incorrect value from the first calculation is used correctly in the second calculation.
descriptions: The response does not include a calculation equivalent to either of the following and the corresponding answer.
The response includes a calculation equivalent to one of the following and the corresponding answer.
The response includes calculations equivalent to both of the following and the corresponding answers.
